scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Kawaikute Gomen'.
Transition screen displaying upcoming performers for the next segment.
Performance of 'Tokyo Shandy Rendez-vous' including short MC interjections towards the end.

subtitles.original: お気に入りの服で
subtitles.english: In my favorite clothes

subtitles.original: 崩せない前髪 くしでといて お出かけしよう
subtitles.english: Comb my bangs so they don't get messy, and let's go out

subtitles.original: 軽い女 ふざけんな
subtitles.english: Easy girl? Don't mess with me

subtitles.original: 重すぎるっつーの
subtitles.english: I said it's too heavy

subtitles.original: チュ！可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute

subtitles.original: 生まれてきちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for being born

subtitles.original: チュ！あざとくてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so calculated

subtitles.original: 人生楽しんでごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for enjoying life

subtitles.original: チュ！可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute

subtitles.original: 努力しちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for putting in effort

subtitles.original: チュ！尊くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so precious

subtitles.original: 女子力高くてごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for being so feminine

subtitles.original: ムカついちゃうよね？ざまあ
subtitles.english: It's annoying, isn't it? Serves you right

subtitles.original: 趣味の違い 変わり者と バカにされても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm made fun of as an eccentric with different tastes

subtitles.original: 負けたくない 怖くもない あんたらごとき
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose, and I'm not afraid of the likes of you

subtitles.original: 自分の味方は自分でありたい 一番大切にしてあげたい
subtitles.english: I want to be my own ally, I want to cherish myself the most

subtitles.original: 理不尽な我慢はさせたくない それが私
subtitles.english: I don't want to make myself endure unreasonable things, that's just me

subtitles.original: チュ！可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute

subtitles.original: 生まれてきちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for being born

subtitles.original: チュ！あざとくてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so calculated

subtitles.original: 人生楽しんでごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for enjoying life

subtitles.original: チュ！可愛くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so cute

subtitles.original: 努力しちゃってごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for putting in effort

subtitles.original: チュ！尊くてごめん
subtitles.english: Chu! Sorry for being so precious

subtitles.original: 女子力高くてごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry for being so feminine

subtitles.original: ムカついちゃうよね？ざまあ
subtitles.english: It's annoying, isn't it? Serves you right

subtitles.original: トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ 作詞・作曲・編曲：ツミキ
subtitles.english: Tokyo Shandy Rendez-vous Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Tsumiki

subtitles.original: あなたにも忘れたいこと 悲しいこと あるのかしらね
subtitles.english: I wonder if you have things you want to forget or sad things too

subtitles.original: 知らない映画なのに涙を流すのは ドラマチックが足りてないからよ
subtitles.english: The reason I cry even though it's a movie I don't know is because there's not enough drama

subtitles.original: そんな愚にもつかないこと くだらないこと 考えてばかりね
subtitles.english: Always thinking about such silly and trivial things

subtitles.original: 雨が上がれば 愛もその欲も 誰かのものになるんでしょう
subtitles.english: Once the rain stops, love and that desire will probably belong to someone else

subtitles.original: 嘘八百のファンデーションも全部 今夜はダメよ
subtitles.english: Even the foundation of lies, all of it, tonight is no good

subtitles.original: なぁ、一体全体どうしてどうして、なぜなぜ、ハッてんの
subtitles.english: Hey, why on earth, why why, why why, are you staring?

subtitles.original: 不安定な勝手ならどこまでいくの
subtitles.english: If it's an unstable selfishness, how far will it go?

subtitles.original: あなた一切合切 放り出せばもう
subtitles.english: If you just throw everything away...

subtitles.original: ああ冗談じゃないわ トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ
subtitles.english: Oh, it's no joke, Tokyo Shandy Rendez-vous

subtitles.original: その時が来たって どうにもならないぜ
subtitles.english: Even if that time comes, nothing can be done

subtitles.original: 曖昧な本当で メランコリーするだけ
subtitles.english: Just being melancholy with an ambiguous truth

subtitles.original: 私を探さないで 意味提供
subtitles.english: Don't look for me, providing meaning

subtitles.original: はぁ、ちゃんちゃら可笑しい法度ばっかで 祝詞が響きもしないわ
subtitles.english: Hah, with nothing but ridiculous rules, the ritual prayers don't even echo

subtitles.original: 実体のない感情放っておいたって 策略なんて会えんのになぜ
subtitles.english: Even if you leave empty emotions alone, why can't you meet any strategies?

subtitles.original: ああもう、懲り懲りよ。私のカットのないキスも じっと凝らして。取り繕って、綿密に書いて
subtitles.english: Oh, I've had enough. Even my uncut kiss, stare at it. Gloss it over, write it meticulously

subtitles.original: 年中無休リップサービス どんがんかましては へきえき
subtitles.english: Year-round lip service, blowing it up and getting fed up

subtitles.original: どんがらがっしゃん フィードバックは 涙の目にもに
subtitles.english: Clatter bang, the feedback is in tearful eyes too

subtitles.original: まぁ、頭ん中ミュージックのせいで あなたの話は一向に聞き取れない
subtitles.english: Well, because of the music in my head, I can't hear what you're saying at all

subtitles.original: 私は全うなこと言ってい、回りだす
subtitles.english: I'm saying proper things, starting to go around

subtitles.original: ターンテーブルで全部 忘れさせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me forget everything on the turntable

subtitles.original: だけど一体全体どうしてどうして、なぜなぜハッてんの
subtitles.english: But why on earth, why why, why why are you staring?

subtitles.original: 不安定な勝手なら見えないままで
subtitles.english: If it's an unstable selfishness, let it remain unseen

subtitles.original: あなた一挙手一投足 食い違ってんの
subtitles.english: Every single move of yours is inconsistent

subtitles.original: ああ冗談じゃないわ トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ
subtitles.english: Oh, it's no joke, Tokyo Shandy Rendez-vous

subtitles.original: その時が来たって どうにもならないぜ
subtitles.english: Even if that time comes, nothing can be done

subtitles.original: 曖昧な本当で メランコリーするだけ
subtitles.english: Just being melancholy with an ambiguous truth

subtitles.original: 私を今
subtitles.english: Me, now

subtitles.original: ホロライブカウントダウン2023、盛り上がってるー！？
subtitles.english: Hololive Countdown 2023, are you having fun!?

subtitles.original: いよいよ今年も、あと少し！
subtitles.english: Finally, this year is almost over too!
